column5: Anyone fished Hidden Bay Outposts recently? Particularly interested in Gage Lake or Armit Lake.Thanks
Fished Gage last July. Do a search or PM me. Great oufitters.....
Fished Armit 2 years ago, PM me
I don't know much about this outfitter, but I love this photo!! That photo alone makes me want to take a trip to Blackstone Lake with them!!
